message: Let's be fair and close the deal!
I'm willing to be a little more generous than your last offer, let's see if we can close this deal.
You didn't offer enough, let's try this!
Let's just split it down the middle. I think we both have a better chance of getting more if we don't keep rejecting each other's offers.
Splitting down the middle doesn't take inflation into account, I need a better deal!
